snippet: The British government said Wednesday that it was banning qat, an herbal stimulant, despite advice against such a step by an official advisory body.
abstract: British government is banning herbal stimulant qat, also known as cathonine, despite advice against such a step by an official advisory body.
lead_paragraph: The British government said Wednesday that it was banning qat, an herbal stimulant, despite advice against such a step by an official advisory body.
